description: Update an existing developer reference type
permissions: Allowed for admin users or users who are manager members of the broker associated with the developer.
validation_notes: Reference type ID argument is required; at least one of --name or --subject-types must be provided; if --subject-types is provided, it must include at least one value and each value must be one of: JobProductionPlan, MaterialType, Project; name must be unique per developer.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be unique per developer if provided.

flags.name: --subject-types
flags.validation: Must include at least one value and each value must be one of: JobProductionPlan, MaterialType, Project.
